original_title: I: Death is Better Than Hate
overview: A mentally challenged man (Indranil) faces the hatred of the peoples surrounding him
tagline: It is like impossible when a soul when a heart can tolerate the HATE it feels like nothing is left in the LIFE we get but we lose we hope but we lost and all that things came in one place in one word 'I'
title: I: Death is Better Than Hate
